scripts.install:full: npm install && cd city-bikes-frontend && npm install && cd ../city-bikes-backend && npm install && cd ..
scripts.seed:db: cd city-bikes-backend && npm run seed:stations && npm run seed:journeys && cd ..
scripts.start:test: concurrently --kill-others "npm run dev:client" " cd city-bikes-backend && npm run start:test"
scripts.test:e2e: concurrently --kill-others "npm run start:test" " cd city-bikes-frontend && npm run test:e2e"
scripts.build:ui: rm -rf ../city-bikes-backend/build && cd city-bikes-frontend && npm run build && cp -r build ../city-bikes-backend/ && cd ..
scripts.build:server: cd city-bikes-backend && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && npm run build:server && npm run deploy
